clundsberg,"2011-06-02T12:19:45.91Z","In the Pink!","

I just received these from Lego.com this morning n the mail.
column2: This last shipment was mostly sale items at lego.com.&nbsp
column3: Knowing that my son really likes to put Lego magnets on the fridge (he really enjoyed his Bricktober Knight and the 78 retro spaceman) I decided to purchase these.&nbsp
column4: PLUS they were reduced to $7.48 which is a great deal for 3 awesome minis.

column1: Packaging is both a pro and a con.
column2: Con: kind of a pain to open.&nbsp
column3: Pro: not being easy to open makes it sturdy.&nbsp
column5: hard cardboard backing makes it great for collectors to store and the bubble encased figures is excellent for displaying.&nbsp
column6: You can feel the magnets pull through the packaging if you place it against a metal surface, however it is not strong enough to hold the 3 figs in the package.

column1: Dyna-Mite - the main reason I was attracted to this set not having had her before.
column2: She has sweet shades, a detailed leather/spy print on *both* sides, a sleek gold mauser lookin gun and (of course) dynamite.&nbsp
column3: Her red hair is a nice design that you don't see too much.

column1: Pirate Girl - The only one of these I already had, but she usually came with bigger or hard to find sets.
column2: She, too has print on both sides, a lovely eye-patch and&nbsp
column3: comes with her sword and flint-lock pistol.&nbsp
column4: She has my favourite design for girl-hair.

column2: apple and would make a great resident for the apple tree-house. She has a pink vest with heart necklace (very nice detail) and also has print on both sides, however the reverse is merely a couple of cloth creases.&nbsp
column4: I originally thought it a shorter bob-cut, but after opening her up I was quite surprised to see a long&nbsp
column5: ponytail hanging down in the back.

column1: This set is 5/5 overall (the 1 for building experience solely because they all came pre-built) and I highly HIGHLY recommend getting this for the not-so-easy to find 3 cool female figures with sweet accessories...especially since they are on sale.
column3:
A great addition to any Lego Ville!
